title: Improve player-facing fixture UX
description: Enhance the player-facing fixture experience with improved layout, better information hierarchy, and more intuitive navigation for viewing fixture details and venue information.
acceptance_criteria: Player fixture list has improved visual hierarchy
Fixture details are easier to scan on mobile
Venue information integrated into fixture flow
testing_requirements: Verify fixture list renders correctly on mobile
Verify fixture detail page shows venue information
Verify navigation between fixture views works smoothly

context.user_story: As a player, I want a clear and easy-to-use fixture view so I can quickly see my upcoming matches and where they are
